# First-conjugation verbs

```{julia}
#| warning: false
#| output: false
#| echo: false
repo = pwd() |> dirname |> dirname

using Tabulae, CitableParserBuilder
using  Markdown

shareddir = joinpath(repo, "datasets", "core-infl-shared") 
lat25dir = joinpath(repo, "datasets", "core-infl-lat25") 
ds = dataset([shareddir, lat25dir])
```

`ds` is a dataset using a Latin orthography with 25 alphabetic characters, distinguishing vocalic "i" and "u" from consonontal or semivocalic "j" and "v."

```{julia}
#| warning: false
#| asis: true
amo = LexemeUrn("ls.n2280")
md_verb_conjugation(amo,ds) |> Markdown.parse
```
